entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
